JobFullDesc:
Condé Nast is seeking an innovative, collaborative, and proven Product-Management professional. The candidate will develop, maintain, and execute the digital strategy and product road map for the most influential media brands at Condé Nast. The role will be focused on developing and maintaining premier products in order to increase reader engagement and drive audience acquisition and will require working collaboratively with several departments , brands and stakeholders. The role will partner with Condé Nast’s Director of Product in driving best in class digital products across multiple platforms.

Primary Responsibilities:

Drive product prioritization and product management methodology for the business by working with internal and external stakeholders including Editorial, Advertising, and Consumer MarketingExposure to the growing trends and use of data driven advertising and data management platformsSuccessfully address complicated and challenging problem setsLearn new problems sets quickly and experience applying creative problem solutionsProject management and multitasking across concurrent projects to deliver on project goalIdentifying critical issues or roadblocks as well as communication of status out to various stakeholdersCreating and managing product and project documentation, including additional information gathering or publishing
Desired Skills & Qualifications:

Experience working with engineering and design teams using agile software developmentExcellent written and verbal communication as well as collaborative skillsSelf-driven, motivated, and ability to drive objectives forward and see projects and initiatives through to completion
Skills: product management, Agile Development, communication skills
